Class ScheduleTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • ScheduleTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    public class ScheduleTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    This class represents the underlying data source used by a JTable to show a student's course schedule. It is a bridge between a Schedule object and a JTable object.
    Version:
    Fall 2016 v1.0
    Author:
    Mikyung Han
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toDay

        public static Weekday toDay​(int column)
        Returns the day of the week corresponding to the given column in the table. The first column (0) is the header column; the second (1) is Monday, the third (2) is Tuesday, and so on.
        Parameters:
        column - the 0-based column to examine
        Returns:
        the corresponding weekday, from MONDAY to FRIDAY
